product_name: WTB Wolverine 27.5 Light TCS Tire - 27.5 x 2.2
long_description: Built to be ridden aggressively over even the roughest terrain, the Wolverine uses numerous working edges for excellent puncture resistance and densely packed material for fast-rolling performance.
short_description: Built to be ridden aggressively over even the roughest terrain, the Wolverine uses numerous working edges for excellent puncture resistance and densely packed material for fast-rolling performance.
